title: Mediating and moderating factors between economic pressure and turnover intention among school teachers in Lebanon during the ongoing crisis era
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Feten Fekih-Romdhane, Anthony Shebly, Tracy Daoud, Reine Gedeon, Rabih Hallit, Sahar Obeid, Diana Malaeb, Souheil Hallit
